job_description:
Required Skills & Qualifications

Strong proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+)

Hands-on experience with React.js and its core principles

Experience with HTML5, CSS3, and responsive design

Familiarity with RESTful APIs

Knowledge of state management libraries (Redux, Context API, etc.)

Experience with Git or other version control systems

Understanding of modern front-end build tools (Webpack, Babel, Vite)

conversation.content: AI Engineering Intern at Scopely. Could you share a bit about your experience with React.js from your projects or work?
Okay, I've also specialized in cloud computing.
That's great! I see you built a Security Monitoring System on AWS. Could you describe how you integrated React.js in any of your projects or work?
so, the security monitoring system was a very different project from
Understood! Could you instead tell me more about your experience with React.js in your personal projects or any specific work-related assignments you've done?

Thank you for sharing more about your experiences, Vaibhavee. It sounds like you have a strong background with a variety of technologies. We appreciate you taking the time to speak with us today. We'll be in touch soon regarding the next steps. Have a great day!

Hello again! If you have any further questions or information to share, feel free to let me know. Otherwise, thank you for your time today, and we'll be in touch soon regarding the next steps. Take care!

evaluation.summary: Vaibhavee has a strong technical background and knowledge in various technologies, but struggled to effectively communicate their experience with React.js, which is crucial for this role.
